file_content.text: All right, men, I know some of you are new to Tatooine, so let's go over a few ground rules.
First off, ration your water consumption. We'll be out there for some time, and this stuff has to last.
Second, stay close to your squad-mates. Sandstorms are not uncommon, and you can get lost real easy.
Finally, and most importantly, watch where you're walking. One misstep and this desert will swallow you whole.
